Two friends encrypted secrets with different public keys but used the same prime. Recover both messages from 858365153561018410499611927425677083830723445882051218052752293704885225007819437495281145659304674015062648447085466954229943241147709065216096091592350 using their shared vulnerability.

The flag format is flag{...}
n=5740613712873491148619487900942773024628733306394497769719909980371309553136669643104502227037312316513378664571714404376456944768103374182263538260874429, n2=5202947526916928268124463437441958998857466769042734978875152796321917156027808438492130329966656562814720094942190297486709745932449665270436265767159593, e=4862130440382029533804687994585718822326529371634367745178989788153542871304171314482132182931975276095531515624196756525983918558528389657250762483584347

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{gootq8d0}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 858365153561018410499611927425677083830723445882051218052752293704885225007819437495281145659304674015062648447085466954229943241147709065216096091592350
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=5740613712873491148619487900942773024628733306394497769719909980371309553136669643104502227037312316513378664571714404376456944768103374182263538260874429, n2=5202947526916928268124463437441958998857466769042734978875152796321917156027808438492130329966656562814720094942190297486709745932449665270436265767159593, e=4862130440382029533804687994585718822326529371634367745178989788153542871304171314482132182931975276095531515624196756525983918558528389657250762483584347
extra_info: p=70873409828570252274284190406739065853845142272220742171939980811160413457007, q=80998130705986635351697232932651957779994843457786461523128575949790706899347, q2=73411841472025992988825018586568330526501015135446134420635604003590650573799, φ(n)=5740613712873491148619487900942773024628733306394497769719909980371309553136517771563967670149686335090039273548080564390726937564408305625502587140518076, φ(n2)=5202947526916928268124463437441958998857466769042734978875152796321917156027664153240829733721393453605726787545809951329302079055857089685621514703128788
